body.p:
Greenville Ky Apl 10 1864.
Gov T E Bramlette
Dear Sir

At request of Sgt Clark I write you in relation to a forfeited bond, case of Commonwealth vs Purdy. The parties herewith send you the papers in relation to the case. Of my own knowledge I know nothing of the case. Respectable persons sign the petition & make statement of the facts. I have glanced over the names, & with pleasure say that they are men of character & standing & should state the facts fairly. I commend the case to your favorable consideration.
